content.detailedDescription:
As i got out of my car to go inside of my house my eyes caught something to the south that made me look. at first i didn't see anything but clear dark night sky. suddenly my eyes caught a soft white glow moving behind the neighbor's treetop. it was bizarre i had no idea what i was looking at. it was moving across the sky in a straight line. i almost couldn't see it but it had a soft white glow. i thought it was a fast moving cloud in the night sky but no other clouds are visible, clear skies. and i have never seen a cloud move that fast. the shape reminded me of a bomber but with no wings. it did have a very prominent "tail" like a bomber would. i heard no sounds from its direction. i watched it fly across the horizon for about 20 seconds and then it was gone behind the treeline, moving east.

it might sound crazy but it really looked like a ghostly image. i also thought it might be some kind of a cloud but it kept its shape the entire time i watched it. it could have been a smoke cloud from someone's fire but i've never seen smoke in such a shape or moving so fast and in a direct flight path when i felt no wind.
content.summary: White, cloud-like, soft white glow, vaguely bomber plane shape with no wings but with tail

content.detailedDescription: Came out of the explorer after hiking with my girlfriend and dog. looked up at the sky and noticed this bright object in the west traveling towards us. it was much bright than all the stars. i would say as bright as jupiter. it had no blinking airplane lights and was completly silent. to bright to be a sattelite also it slightly changed directions so i feel it rules out satelite.
content.summary: Orb,yellow, no airplane lights, travled from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Im doing this for a freind he,s nervous could someoone please contact me i 

have pictures he said he will talk to someone if they know what they are everybody thinks he is crazy he has 4 hrs of pictures thank you gary
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saucer disk

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was going to get coffee
2. my roommate
3. something flickering or on fire
4. it was like a flickering mass. it seemed to float to our street. it dimmed and then brightened. it began to dart from right to left. when directly over us, it appeared to climb in altitude and dimmed out. my roommate witnessed the object shoot off to the south.
5. elated, excited
6. it dimmed/blinked out.

we don't know what the strange light on the side of the pic is or the haze that seems to surround the object. no flash was used.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flickering amber mass that blinked and darted.

content.detailedDescription: Was passenger on ba flight from london to houston. had just flown over great lakes , was taking photos of clouds and noticed a flash from below. i expected to see a plane emerge from clouds below us, instead noticed a strange looking cloud start moving towards our plane. the cloud became more solid in appearance and was pale yellow color dome shaped. it moved steadily towards right side of plane and did i not follow the same direction of all the other clouds which were streaming past. i managed to video it as it passed by back of plane. it's not a clear video due to ice crystals on window and difficulty of filming through small window.
content.summary: Observed during commercial flight over great lakes

content.detailedDescription: Running in a country store left home at 5:45am noticed red and white lights in the distance thinking it was a new tower when i pulled in parking lot it kept coming closer, slowly passing over i saw a square shaped object with white and red lights on each corner saw something of rings maybe, on the bottom or circles for design, engine i'm not sure could also see the rim of the side. higher than the trees going toward the dam in a southwesterly direction i got the store manager then the cashier came out we watched it slowly going away. we were surprised how close with no noise, and the shape being square it seemed odd looked up on the internet and saw others saw something close to what i'd seen. 12/30/11 just at dawn no sunshine yet sky was light enough to really make the object stand out i didn't have zoom on my phone camera
content.summary: White and red lights a mile awya seemed like a new tower but it slowly flew in a line was square got a store manager and cashier we watched it go slowly sw direction seemed to have rigs on bottom saw sides as sun was comming up metal odd shape for flying

content.detailedDescription: I was running from inside my barn towards our house one night and noticed two extremely bright lights, i kept running, turned back and only saw one. the next night i had a friend over and we were out side and i told him about the lights from the previous night. we looked in the same area and there was one bright light, brighter than any star in the sky. it began to move up in the sky slowly, then down and to the left, then slowly back up and eventually disappeared. two more dim red lights moved up from the tree line and began to get brighter and then also disappeared. some slowly dimmed away slowly and others disappeared abruptly. sense then, they've been visible in the sky every night (that isn't cloudy) for about the last month.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Me and a buddy walked out of my barn and noticed a bright light that began to move oddly. shortly after, others appeared and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: My parents were camping in fort washington md and my mom was taking a picture of the lake.I was going through her photos on her phone and noticed the lights in this one. i asked her if she was inside and maybe it was a reflection but she said she was on top of a hill outside. she also didn't notice them when she took the picture. i thought it was strange. i have no explanation of it
content.summary: Strange lights over ft washington md

content.detailedDescription:
It was on a cold evening in january that i was alone at home, sitting at my desk writing when i suddenly had the urgent need to go to the kitchen. so i stood up from my desk when i entered the kitchen i heard a low humming sound coming from outside and whan i looked at the window i saw bright lights coming from a disk shaped thing -where from the humming sound came - and the lights were very bright - yellow,green and red-orange.
i was absolutely amazed and stood still looking at this happening. the thing was at a distance about  ca.10-15 metres outside just in front of the parking area so the cars were at the other side of the light object.
i felt i shouldn't move - had the feeling that i couldn't move anyway - and i heard the constant humming coming from the object that was hovering over the earth ca.4-5 metres above the ground. when i had been standing there looking for some time i suddenly felt that i should call my friend to ask him if he saw what i was looking at. to my surprise i managed to walk into the next room to call him and told him what i was looking at and asked him if he could see it too(this was really rather silly as he lived at some distance from my house and couldn't have seen the object)but he told me to get my binoculats to try to see better and if there was somebody inside the object. so i went back to the kitchen with the binoculars and thought that the object would likely have disappeared but to my surprice it was still there. when i looked through the binoculars nothing had changed - the object was still there hovering and glowing in green,yellow and red-orange colours. i saw this very clearly.I could only stand there and look but suddenly i could hear that the drumming sound changed somehow and became a little deeper and at the downside of the object there appeared a black metallic looking cylinder ca.1 1/2 meter wide and this cylinder moved slowly down towards the surface of the ground. i was completely stunned at this sight and didn't know what was happening. i had the impression that i should go on looking and so i did. after ca.2 minutes the cylinder touched the ground and began boring down under the surface -still with this drumming sound. now i began to wonder if some neighbours were looking at this too but i saw nobody - and couldn't hear any voices from outside. i thought this was quite suprising and wondered that maybe my neighbours were too afraid to utter a sound.
i remember looking at my watch and realized that i had been looking at this object for more than half an hour as the clock now was half past nine( it was just nine o'clock when it began). i stood there and saw that the cylinder was still boring in the ground and the cylinder had to be pretty long as it had been boring down in the ground all this time. after some time i saw the cylinder move up again from the surface - very slowly - untill it disappeared again into the oval object. i couldn't imagine what the purpose could be of boring into the earth in front of the building like this, but when the cylinder had completely joined the object again the summing became lower like it was in the beginning of the event. 
then, again - the summing sound changed a little and the colours were blinking a little quicker as the object began to move upwards slowly higher and higher until i saw it in the air about ca. 100 metres high. then suddenly it moved slowly to north  and still went further up - higher and higher - and at last flew rather quickly in the north direction to the mountains in north of the town. the night was still and clear - you could see the stars in the sky but i saw how the object flew rather slowly longer in the north direction until i lost sight of it. 
i looked at my watch and it was a few minutes past ten when i lost sight of it.So i had been looking at the object for a whole hour. i thought how amazing this had been and  was sure that many people had been looking at the phenomenon besides me - and there would be some articles in the papers and some news about this "ufo" - sighting next day. to my big surprise nothing of this sort happened - no articles - nothing - and when i asked my neighbours the next day if they had seen something unusual the night before - just outside the building - nobody  remembered having seen anything unusual. today i'm still wondered what really happened and why i alone(?) had been seeing this object. wish i could get an explanation....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sitting at my desk  writing i had suddenly the impression i should  go to next room and look  and saw the thing through the window there  at some distance.

content.detailedDescription: Howdy, i live in a passive solar house. the south side is mostly glass, i was just looking outside befor going to bed & i noticed an odd colored star {more blue} it seamed to blink or twinkle, just enought to make me watch it. i saw that the stars were moving but not this one, i got out the spy-glasses got it in focas & to my suprize it was perfectly round it had red, blue, & white/clear lights that seamed to glissen or twinkle, no blinking. it was in the southern sky just about stright above me it was 10:10 pm iwent to the other side of the house to look at it & it was going/missing no sign of it. 10 minutes later ready to go to bed i looked out where i had seen it, i was a little freaked out when i saw it in the western sky. i grabed the benockulars ? it was still about a mile away. it was just below the tree line. i could not see it through the glasses but i could see it was there. iran back where i saw it on the south side of the house, it was just far enought to the west that i couldn't see it through the glasses. i went back to the west side & it was going. it moved when i moved inside the house so i'am still a little freaked out. i'am a veteran i'll be 65 on wed 4, jan this is my first sighting,   greg   --------------------------- +
content.summary: Looked bluer than other stars wasen't moving. got  spy-glasses it's round solid red-green-white/clear twinkling lights moved-from-true-south-to-due-west/felt-like-it-knew-i-was-watching-it this-is-my-first-sighting-&-i'll-be-65-on-wensday

content.detailedDescription: I was in the parking lot of rite aid now stop and shop just getting out of my car of the rite aid in litchfield on rt 202 after school one evening to visit a friend who worked there. i believe it was late fall 1985 when i noticed a deltoid shape of 7 white lights high in the sky moving east to west dead over head. it was approximately 2000 feet high and made absolutely no sound but blocked out the stars so it was very large like an airliner. i saw this with about 4-5 other people in the parking lot and there was a story in the torrington register the next day. watched it for about 10 minutes until it slowly flew out of sight.
content.summary: Hudson valley boomerang in litchfield

content.detailedDescription: i always really wonder if we were alone in the universe but now i seem to have got the answer no....We are not alone in the universe. my dad told me about an event that happend to him in the 60's this event took place in redondo beach c.A it was about 10:50 p.M he was outside when out of no where there was a huge super bright light hovering over him his sister and a couple of friends the circle shaped object made a wooa wooa sound and that it was going in a circle clolck wise. this was at a top of a hill top where the house was at.The light left to the side really fast and them it was a small dot in the sky then came back to them really fast big and bright again they called their dad and hen he finally came out the object went up and was gone. the next day they reported it to the news who road a story about the insident. when i woke up to go to work about 5:30 am friday i went outside to my truck to warm it up i was there with my next door neighbor when i was talking to him about how it still like night i was looking at the sky when i notice a ball like shape in a 45 degree angle it was bright like a star an moving in a staight line. we both saw it them we said that it coulnt be an airplane because we saw airplane too an they had a flasing ligh red and blue we live by the airport path so i know an airplanes looks. this was not an airplane this shape was going from right to left then like at 6:00 am we saw another identical shape go from the front of us to the back to the horizon this was real and i know we are not alone.
content.summary: I was going to work when i saw i light in the sky that was not an airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
When outside of my home, facing southward direction i witness 2 ufo���s moving south easterly direction, they were dark metallic in color and appeared to be disc/cylindrical in shape. the fist one became extremely bright and just disappeared. this was followed by a second one, again became extremely bright and disappeared almost at the same spot in the sky.
i went into the house and told my wife i spotted 2 ufo���s ���yeah right���. 
she came outside and i pointed to the sky at the location where i saw them, then all of a sudden we saw two more this time they appeared to adjacent from each other, same scenario, we watch them and they appeared to be very bright and again just disappeared.
in the sky at the same time were commercial aircraft leaving contrails heading east to west and vice versa which i have photographed.
it was not until i downloaded the photos to my computer that we saw i had captured two ufo���s on my on my camera at same time as the commercial aircraft with contrails. 
these ufo���s never left any contrail trace in the sky
photo attached, both ufo���s are on the same photo
1st photo ufo_1 shows the ufo at top of photo
2nd photo ufo_2 a little harder to see, but blown up can be seen nne of the top contrail.
(name moved to fi box) cms 12/30/11 08:51 cst flg
content.summary: We saw 4 ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I went onto my back balcony to smoke a cigarette before my wife went to work and as i looked out into the back yard; i noticed that there was a bright band of what looked like clouds traveling straith up into the air. it did not look like any cloud that i had ever seen; so i looked closer and realized that what i was seeing was impossible. i ran back into the house and asked my daugther to bring her digital camera and i pointed out the thing to her and she took a photo of it. what we could see with our eyes was not what showed up on the digital screen on the back of her camera; we could see this double band of bright white/yellow goldish cloud like thing that extended straight up and down for about 3 to 4 miles (this was very visible against the dark rain clouds in the backgroud). what was  visible on the camera was a thin trail that went straight up for about a mile before taking a sharpe 90 degree left turn that went out for about half a mile before taking a 45 degree turn back into the opposite direction then it turned another 90 degree turn and continued of the screen. what we saw with our eyes, was not what the camera picked up. we went inot the house and i showed the photo to my wife and she finally agreed with me that very strange things are happening in the skies over our community. this is the 3rd sighting that i have witnessed and the first to be caught on camera. this is the truth as i know it to be; i served 21 years in the us army and now work as dod employee here in germany. this incident made it impossible for me not to make this report; i have seen a lot of unexplained things, but this one was just to close to home for my liking. i will not attach a copy of the photo to this website. if you would like to view it then contact me via my email address and i will have my daughter send it to you.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It made me run back into my house.

content.detailedDescription: Last night, as i was walking the dog, i noticed a single orange light coming towards me from the southwest and traveling overhead to the northeastern part of the sky.  at first i thought it was some kind of low flying plane or helicopter, but it was fuzzy in appearance and flaring outward in all directions. it moved slowly. soon afterwards it flew directly over me, and behind the cloud deck off to the northeast. next about 20 seconds later, i saw two more orange lights traveling in formation, heading on the same course as the first object.  the two objects appeared from the same direction, same course, same speed, and same altitude, flying in a single file pattern. as i tried to get a closer look at them, i noticed that each was a fuzzy, glowing, light orange ball or orb. they did not appear to have any solid noticeable center, and their outlines were faint and semitransparent (almost halo-like). these objects made no sound at all, had no beacons or flashing lights on them, and just seemed to float along. their speed would be equivalent to a small plane or helicopter. they were not moving very fast. but these lights were definitely not aircraft. i have no idea how large they may have been or how far away they actually were. what is interesting is that when the objects were directly overhead, i noticed a slight wobble and floating movement (unconventional propulsion), in which one of objects moved slightly away from the other one, slowing down for a moment and then speeding up again to meet back in formation with the other object.  after a few seconds they continued to travel at the same speed towards the northeast.  my thoughts were that these two strange orange orbs were following, or catching up with the first orange orb.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs or fireballs fly in formation over seattle (capitol hill/madison valley) last night december 26, 2011 at around 2:17 am.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was comming from york. pa on 695 e and i was in the towson/ parkville area going about 70 mph.  i happened to look to the left on the horizon which the overpass i was on crosses joppa road which seems to be on a hill and noticed 3 lights in perfect distance in the sky. the lights seem to be a triangle when you directly look at it.  i glanced again and noticed it was still there,  i looked again since 695 was heavy and noticed the bottom light go out and then the top and left bottom light go out.  it lasted from 1 minute to 2 minutes.  then it was gone.

2.  i looked over to the left because i noticed a brighter light. 
3.  i first thought that it might have been a helicopter hovering and turned on its search light but there was no path of light. and then i noticed two other lights stationary and seem to have equal distance.  
4.  i couldn't tell if it was an actual object it only appeared to be form an object due to the placement of the lights.  the lights when out from botom r, top, and then bottom left. there was no discoloration in the middle that i noticed but then i was driving also.
5. i felt that these lights seemed out of place and it appeared to be equal distance apart and big in the sky. i kept looking to see if it was an aircraft or helicopter. after the sighting i felt i witnessed something out of the ordinary but i cannot conclude what i had seen. i called my wife and friend and told them about the event i witnessed. i wanted to stop and take a picture but 695 was too busy with speeding traffic.
6.  i lost sight of the object as i drove past but the lights appeared to be going out.
content.summary: 3 lights stationary on horizon in form of triangle and faded out one by one. about 100 to 300 ft apart for each light.

content.detailedDescription: I took puppy outside before leaving for work, i looked up and seen what looked like shooting stars coming out of a shimmering star, i went and got my phone and took pics and then got a awesome video, got to work and it is still there, showed my boss and he's amazed too. it has been there long time between big dipper and moon, saucer shape spinning like with blue and red lights
content.summary: I was outside with puppy, saw what looked like shooting stars coming from a shimmering star,took pics and amazing video, came to work its still there

content.detailedDescription: My wife our 5 year old daughter and myself were driving on blue lane a mile south of columbia pa. coming up a hill my wife alerted me to objects in the sky straight ahead. i pulled over and we watched 3 shimmering cross like objects bouncing slowly in unison above the tree line. we watched them for about 10 - 15 seconds. i watched the two on the left drifted off to the left over the tree line. the third object on the right was being observed by my wife saw it flip over and appeared as a saucer shape. it shot off very fast heading north toward columbia. i immediately checked my watch to make sure we didn't lose any time. it was 4:10 pm. with no missing time. it was a cold sunday with gray sky.
content.summary: My wife and i saw 3 shimmering silver white crosses boucing in unison above the tree line probably 300-500 feet away. we watched them for about 10 seconds then 2 drifted off to the left behind the tree line. the 3rd shot off real fast.

content.detailedDescription: My wife our 5 year old daughter and myself were driving on blue lane a mile south of columbia pa. coming up a hill my wife alerted me to objects in the sky straight ahead. i pulled over and we watched 3 shimmering cross like objects bouncing slowly in unison above the tree line. we watched them for about 10 - 15 seconds. i watched the two on the left drifted off to the left over the tree line. the third object on the right was being observed by my wife saw it flip over and appeared as a saucer shape. it shot off very fast heading north toward columbia. i immediately checked my watch to make sure we didn't lose any time. it was 4:10 pm. with no missing time. it was a cold sunday with gray sky.
content.summary: My wife and i saw 3 shimmering silver white crosses boucing in unison above the tree line probably 300-500 feet away. we watched them for about 10 seconds then 2 drifted off to the left behind the tree line. the 3rd shot off real fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I left the house to go to the store.  noticed the house on the hill across a river valley had a fire outside. not unusual but it drew my attention to our hill field across the finely river.  above it was the ufo.  it was flashing white and colored lights of whit, green/blue, and red.  at first i though might be plane, then it suddenly dropped what would have been 100 feet at the distant i was observing it from.  it then did few more zig zags rising and falling.  at this point i ran back to the house and called my husband.  he came outside and observed the same sort of behavior as me.  it was then we noticed pail beams of light shooting off it.  some projecting toward the ground some outward up toward the sky.  they came on and off at random patterns and angles from different location on the faint dark object. the shape was not light but you could make out a roundish form the lights were attached too.

my and my husbands feelings were astonished, and bit creeped out.  he had never seen a ufo before i did once not far from here actually when i was a teenager. my sighting back then was reported, and very similar to this one.

by this time a few minutes at the most it was starting to fade because while it was zigging and zagging it was also moving away from us.  after 3 to 4 minutes it faded totally from view.

we both went inside, i canceled my trip to the store and we came here to log our sighting.

while i marked us as wanting to remain anonymous we would be will to talk further to mufon if they have more questions or if they have any other witness to corroborated our sighting.
content.summary: Flashing ufo

content.detailedDescription: My sister went on a vacation so i fed her cats an went outside an saw 2/3 planes/jets then realized that one was vastly diferent with apearing and disapearing diamonds of white and blue squares this thing went strait across the blue sunny sky this thing is the strangest thing i still have dreams about it like is telling me something
content.summary: Two diamond shaped objects seemed to apeare and disapear as this thing moved across the sky in day time planes were visible at the same time this thing was not a regular object it was different it was so uniqe i cant descibe it

content.detailedDescription: I was on i-70 in missouri heading west, about the 46 mile marker on 12-29-11 around 4:40 pm.  there are many radio towers with flashing lights in the area so i thought the object was a tower until i got closer.  there was no tower but an object hovering no more than 50ft south of the highway roughly at the same height of the top of said towers.  it was pointed east, parallel with the highway.  as i got closer, i could tell it was a b2 bomber and i was waiting for it to fly by.  as i drove closer i could tell, it wasn't moving at all.  i drove under the object and was able to get a clear view of the outline, definitely a b2 bomber shape, but i have never seen one hover.  the car next to me noticed, i saw them trying to take pictures.  there was traffic so i did not stop.  i drove a mile or so to the next exit and turned around.  as i drove back, heading east, i could see in the distance, the object had not moved, it was still there.  when i got within a half a mile, it took off at the speed i assumed it should be moving, only perpendicular to the the direction it had previously been facing.  i headed south over a huge field and trees until i lost sight of it.  the sky was overcast but there was plenty of light to see it fly for a few miles.  i did not have a chance to get a photo.  there was a lot of traffic, i know the cars around me saw it, many slowed down to look.  if anyone else reports, i would love to know if the stories corroborate.
content.summary: It looked like a b2 bomber with one light on the tip of each wing that flashed

content.detailedDescription: As i heard the car next door start i decided to look out my window and i saw a plane/jet then i saw it was diferrent than any other plane/jet i had ever seen the bright red light went from almost the front to back this might have been a blimp but can blimp go 250/300mph this realy seems odd i have obsreverd a wide variety of planes jets blimps day and nite i think this was some thing else also something i cant explane a feeling
content.summary: Thought it was a plane/jet then saw the entire side was a bright red light no plane has this kind of lights also the flashing lights seemed different

content.detailedDescription: One day my wife and i had just got home from grocery shopping,and as we got out of the car,for some reason,we both looked up at the same time and turned and looked at each other with disbelief...What we saw was a cigar-shaped ufo that looked like two chrome links of sausage touching together.We both watched it move from horizon to horizon,north to south,but when it got about a quarter of the way we also saw a jet,military most likely,trying to catch up to the ufo.It was easy to tell that the afterburners were on by the trail behind it! we watched this fruitless effort until we couldn't see it any longer.We took the groceries inside and put them away,neither of us saying a word.Then my wife says "lets go back out and see if we can see anything else!" so we went back outside and as sure as i am breathing,we saw somthing coming from the south,in a direct line reverse of what we had previously seen.They at first looked like two black dots with a ball of light ahead of them.As they got closer,we could see that it was the same ufo,only this time being followed by two jets!I would say each crossing took about a minute and a half,more or less.We never spoke of it for a few years to each other or anyone else.We did a couple of years later and were scoffed at so we never brought it up again.
content.summary: My wife and i saw a cigar-shaped fly over us twice!

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to my truck and saw three bright lights. one light was blinking like a plane would. i heard no noise. they seemed to be quite low for planes/jets and most likely wouldve heard them. it seemed that the one blinking light was tailing the two closer lights. as the two brighter lights flew further they became closer until it emerged into one. the one blinking that was following seemed to stay behind or distant until the two emerged, at one point, before the two emerged, it seemed as the two brighter lights hovered and then took off into the distance. i watched until the one blinking and two/one (which emerged) went horizontal and off into the distance where we could no longer see them.
content.summary: Three lights with one blinking behind the two closer. the two bright lights got closer and emerged into one

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down a residential street in the dark when suddenly, my headlights landed on a ~7 ft. tall man like creature. it almost looked like a very tall standing monkey, but it also resembled a man. it looked as if it had fur all over it's body that was a medium red color. what really looked odd to me was that it seemed to have a translusent aura around it. i had to focus very hard to see these details because it seemed like the creature was moving at a pace of nearly 50 mph. i was afraid, ofcours, but i didn't feel as if it were here to harm me or anyone else. it seemed scared more than anything else. i feel it was trying to hide or find a way home because it was running right toward a large wooded area. i lost sight of the object within 2-4 seconds of first seeing it because it was moving so fast.
content.summary: Entity ran across road very fast approx. 40 feet in front of car.

content.detailedDescription:
i took this photo this morning of the sunrise briefly after walking out of my house i looked back ad snapped the photo. i didn't notice it at the time but after looking at the photos on the pc i found a round orb in photo of sunrise on 12.29.11 at 8:46 am est in staten island ny
 considering the moonrise's at 10:10 am then sets at 9:11pm and could not have been the orb, it appears 3d round like a ball with a shadow on one side.
   from where i was standing when i took the photo, the object is in a se direction. in closed is the original un altered photo from my lg-lgvx9200 
3.0 megapixel cell phone camera.
content.summary: Orb found in photo of sunrize on 12.29.11 at 8:46 am est in staten island ny.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at the time, i forget which road it was but it was in westminster heading north. i noticed the objects because they were brighter than airplanes and seemed to be hovering over the ?Lafyette? area. i thought it was just an airplane with the airport near by but these objects were brighter than the stars and airplanes i'm used to seeing. the objects didn't do anything they just seemed to hover there, the less brighter one higher the brightest. i don't really have any feelings about what i saw because i'm not sure what it was...Plane? flares? helicopter? i'm just not sure, if anything i'm just confused. i lost sight od them after turning onto 120th east bound to go home.
content.summary: 2 hovering lights over lafyette area.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Before i tell about the star-like objects, i have to go back to the report i filed with mufon that happened on 7/13/11 when i sighted a 250'-500' triangle while eastbound on i-10 at mm345.  read this report first because on this same night after seeing my first ufo my eyes where searching the night sky as i continued driving toward san antonio, tx.  keep in mind that i leave ft. stockton between 8-10 pm and arrive san antonio 1-3 am.  at about mm485 just east of kerrville i noticed a large star (4-5 times larger than normal) at a low altitude, about 5-10 degrees above the horizon.  sometimes the hills and trees would block my view of it.  i kept sight of it all the way into san antonio after i had taken the i-410e loop and continued north on i-35.  at this point it was at a 45 degree angle up and about 15 degrees to the east of the interstate.  then i exit at mm175.  i continued to see this same sequence daily (monday-friday) for about 4-6 weeks.  then i started noticing the star farther west, earlier in the evening.  in mid september i saw it from the ft. stockton yard (mm259) at 8 pm.  i had always watched it closely and i couldn't really see if it was moving, sometimes i thought it was, but being in a big truck bouncing around i was never sure, even though i had stopped on occasion and watched it for a few minutes.  i continued to see this star almost every night (m-f) in different locations.  it would be below the high clouds but the low clouds would block my view of it.  on november 23, 2011, at 10:25 pm i stopped at mm361 near ozona, tx to watch this star that was a little south of ozona, as i watched it did a little dance and then moved up and down, i really was not sure if i saw the dance or if it was in my head but i knew that i saw it move up and down.  it appeared to be about 2-5 miles away and i kept sight of it at a 20 degree angle all the way into san antonio mm550.  i'm on my return trip home, same night, november 24 now, and i see this star object at i-10 mm545, it's just a little south of the interstate and i keep sight of it off and on through kerrville mm508, at 4:25am i stop at a parking area mm498 and watch this thing for a couple of minutes and i'll be damned if it didn't do another little dance in the sky and then start moving west.  i jumped in the truck and continued west on i-10 and kept sight of it until mm488 when it disappeared over the horizon.  i was traveling at 65 mph and estimate it was traveling about 150 mph.  i won't go into detail about all of the sightings, but i have seen them move up and down, left and right often.  i've seen them turn off their lights at dawn as they speed up heading west.  it seems that they travel east later evening and travel west early morning, but this does not hold true to all sightings.  lately i've been seeing 2-3 objects over ft. stockton about 7-9pm, often i see one just south of ozona about 9-11pm, i don't see much over sonora.  just after christmas 2011 i saw 3 objects se of junction at about 6am, and lately they have been over sw san antonio on a regular basis.  since christmas i have seen an increase.  on 12/28 i saw 5 star-like objects on my way to san antonio and on 12/29 i saw 9 on my to sa.  i looked at one with low power binoculars and i could see the constant glowing/pulsing white light and a small red flashing light off one side with a little bit of a blue/green light.
i have pointed these out to some of the other drivers but they seem not to care or don't want to know.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Increase in low altitude star-like objects that pulsate, hover, travel and dance.
